name: A Dicey Dilemma - Patched Version
description: Dicey Dilemma is a game made in under 48 hours for the gmtk game jam. This is an updated version released after the end of the jam. In Dicey Dilemma the player must manage their dice and their character in order to travel around the board and defeat all the enemies.  The enemies gain more health as you go on, how many levels in a row can you beat? Thanks to @mouse_9291 on twitter for making me the music for the game during the challenge.
